text: tatha (yaad karo) jab ibraaheem ne kahaah he mere paalanahaar! mujhe dikha de ki too murdon ko kaise jeevit kar deta hai? (allaah ne) kahaah kya tum eemaan nahin laaye? usane kahaah kyon nahin? parantu taaki mere dil ko santosh ho jaaye. allaah ne kahaah chaar pakshee le aao aur unahen apane se paracha lo. (phir unhen vadh karake) unaka ek-ek ansh (bhaag) parvat par rakh do. phir unhen pukaaro. ve tumhaare paas daude chale aayenge aur ye jaan le ki allaah prabhutvashaalee, tatvagy hai
